summary: This document is a servicing disclosure statement from Fifth Third Mortgage Co regarding mortgage loan applicants. It outlines the rights of applicants under the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA) and informs them about the potential transfer of loan servicing.
keyFacts: The document informs mortgage loan applicants about their rights under the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA).
It states that the servicing of the loan may be transferred to a different loan servicer.
Applicants are advised to save this statement with their loan documents.
